trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGELP5THETWELVEWONDERS_00756_BION_000_000<tab>What an enchanting familiar! I would be delighted to assist in your little journey of discovery and personal growth.

TEXT_REGELP5THETWELVEWONDERS_00756_BION_000_010<tab>My role is to maintain the Wonders, and thus the climate across Elpis. I ensure that our every environment meets the needs of our flora, fauna...and staff, of course.

TEXT_REGELP5THETWELVEWONDERS_00756_BION_000_011<tab>Environs representing each part of Etheirys are recreated here in Elpis, that we might gain a robust understanding of our concepts' potential. As such, maintaining the appropriate balance region-by-region is tricky work─but more than worth the effort.

TEXT_REGELP5THETWELVEWONDERS_00756_BION_000_020<tab>The Twelve Wonders is the wellspring of Elpis's weather, after a fashion. Here do we employ the latest spellcraft from Amaurot to maintain and adjust the assorted climes through which our creations frolic─for test purposes.

TEXT_REGELP5THETWELVEWONDERS_00756_BION_000_021<tab>Naturally, as in any other part of Elpis, we also observe and experiment with said concepts. This conversation being, perhaps, one such experiment...
